overview: Go to the seashore of Portugal with eight super-stacked, all-natural knockouts. We brought the hottest Euro-busters to a villa and got 'em naked. Lorna Morgan hosts this video which takes you behind the scenes of a SCORE photo shoot. Joining Lorna are the legendary Linsey Dawn McKenzie, Kerry Marie, Annette Christianson, Jade, Adele Stephens, Teresa May and Jessica Turner. This non-stop boob party with the sweetest pussies you've ever tasted! Only SCORE delivers the best real tits in the world with this line-up! Playing on the beach in bikinis, boob jiggling, bouncing and bobbing, naked poolside exercise sessions, behind the scenes in the makeup and dressing rooms, photo shoots in progress, even shopping for the week's groceries, these beautiful British babes will make you completely drain your balls as you savor them in tit-packed action. The footage of Jade and Annette Christianson (also in Busty Euro Babes) is also extremely rare as they are not ones to do video modeling.
title: On Location: Portugal
